text: Lawrence Edward Walsh (January 8, 1912 â€“ March 19, 2014) was an American lawyer and former U.S. District Court judge and Deputy Attorney General. Walsh grew up in New York City. He was appointed Independent Counsel in December 1986 to investigate the Iran-Contra affair during the Ronald Reagan Administration. Walsh died from natural causes at the age of 102 at his Nichols Hills, Oklahoma home. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1912 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:People from Nova Scotia Category:Politicians from New York City Category:United States Deputy Attorneys General
title: Lawrence Walsh
